text.section: Moneys deposited in the Ke-HN fund shall be disbursed by the State Treasurer upon the warrant of the board. This fund shall be used solely for purposes related to the Ke-HN as approved by the board. The fund shall not lapse, and funds not expended during any fiscal year shall carry forward to the next fiscal year.

law.history: Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 30, sec. 5, effective March 8, 2005.
